Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client
      • ChatClient
  • public class ChatClient
extends Client
    This class represents a type of client, a human ChatClient.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Client

        serverIn, serverOut, socket

      ChatClient​(java.lang.String consoleAddress, java.lang.String consolePort)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatClient

        public ChatClient​(java.lang.String consoleAddress,
                  java.lang.String consolePort)
        The constructor initialises userInput, socket (after validation), serverIn and serverOut. It then sends the server a message informing it which type of client it is.
        Parameters:
        consoleAddress - String representing the address entered into the console (default is "localhost" if none was entered)
        consolePort - String representing the port number entered into the console (default is "14001" if none was entered)

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method, creates an instance of ChatClient using console arguments as input for portString and address ("14001" and "localhost" are defaults respectively) and calls the go method
        Parameters:
        args - arguments received from commandline

      • go

        public void go()
        Implementation of the abstract method which is how the ChatClient should run. It sets up two threads, one to read the data from the server and one to write the data to the server (This is so both reading and writing can occur concurrently using multi-threading), and once their main loops are broken from, the BufferedReaders are closed and then the socket is closed.
        Specified by:
        go in class Client

      • clientType

        protected SenderType clientType()
        Implementation of the abstract method which returns the client type.
        Specified by:
        clientType in class Client
        Returns:
        senderType senderType.client which represents the type of the client is ChatClient
